Articles.Content:
Hello

I can`t stop thinking that there are mods i need but i cant find them.

first mod

The possibility of reconstructing vessels and stations in space (using only parts of which consists vessel/station)

The reason I am looking for a similar mod is I can`t balance my big ships (center of mass + center of thrust) (which were built in space).

And really want to add Strut connectors for T and +(plus) docked ships (when i start engines i have big problems here).

In real life, I think the astronauts can pull cables between modules (EVA).

=======

second mod

Landing on the moon is very simple. Weak gravity, there is no atmosphere, there is no rotation of the planet.

But landing on the necessary point on Kerbin is a torture for me (I do not use MechJeb).

I would like to find a mod that takes into account these factors (grav, atmo,rotation) and put a point on the planet where you land (if you can`t do anything)

============

Anybody knows this mods or something like this?

Hello

And really want to add Strut connectors for T and +(plus) docked ships (when i start engines i have big problems here).

In real life, I think the astronauts can pull cables between modules (EVA).

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/85599-WIP-ActiveStruts-Dev-Thread-updated-10-10-2014

I would like to find a mod that takes into account these factors (grav, atmo,rotation) and put a point on the planet where you land (if you can`t do anything)

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/93685-0-24-0-25-Trajectories-v1-0-0-(2014-11-17)-atmospheric-predictions-FAR-NEAR - at least in the part that involves athmosphere (in this cases alsa takes account of rotation).
Kerbal Attachment System will let you move (some) parts, attach struts, etc.

DenisV, 2nd mod is what I was looking for. Thanks.

hab136, hm good mod i will try it. Thanks.
